prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Bass, Drums, Piano, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Guitar, Bass, and Drums, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Bass, Drums, and Piano, but no Brass instruments.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Piano, Guitar, Bass, and Drums, excluding Brass.
